item.description:
This is also the Opening Reception for several other Exhibits. 

There is no Red Sox Game on this night due to the All Star Break. A few of us will head to Kenmore Square between 5:30 and  7:30 pm for the Opening Reception of the exhibit "Let's Play Ball", a baseball themed exhibit with Photographs by Arthur Griffin, David C. Levinthal and Dr. Ernest C. Withers. Please go to the[url=http://www.panopt.com/home.php] Panopticon Gallery[/url] web site for additional information. [url=www.panopt.com][/url].

The event is free and complimentary beverages and lite food is often served. Some guests may adjourn to a nearby watering hole afterwards. 

I expect to be there early at 5:30pm and will meet with others at the Boston Harbor Hotel Blues Barge afterwards.
item.how_to_find_us: Yes RSVPs E Mail other Yes RSVPs to meet
item.name: Let's Play Ball Opening Reception at Panopticon Gallery in theHotel Commonwealth
